hero.title: Why you should working with me?
hero.subtitle: I offer a hands-on, client-focused web development service — from frontend design to backend logic — making me your one-stop solution for building responsive websites, web apps, and management systems. With strong problem-solving skills, adaptability, and a full-stack approach, I bring reliability, flexibility, and modern tech expertise to every project.

card1.title: Problem-Solving Mindset
card1.body: I've learned web development by doing real projects, solving real problems. This helps me think practically and work efficiently under pressure.

card2.title: Full-Stack Development Skills
card2.body: From designing frontend interfaces with React & React Native to building scalable backends with Node.js, Laravel , Express, MongoDB or MySQL — I can handle the full development cycle.

card3.title: Fast Learner & Adaptable
card3.body: Whether it's a new framework, an unexpected challenge, or switching tasks quickly, I’m always ready to learn and adapt. I can grow with your project.

card4.title: Reliable, Trustworthy & Easy to Work With
card4.body: I communicate clearly, deliver on time, and value long-term collaboration. My goal is not just to finish a project but to make sure it succeeds.
